sf_step_1.text: A detective must uncover the truth behind a series of murders that reveal a conspiracy spanning decades.

sf_step_2.text: A detective investigates a murder that seems straightforward, but clues point to something deeper. The first disaster: a key witness is killed before they can testify. The second disaster: the detective discovers they've been investigating the wrong person all along. The third disaster: the conspiracy reaches into the highest levels of power, putting the detective's life in danger. In the end, the detective must expose the truth, even if it means sacrificing everything.

stc_opening_image.text: A crime scene, seemingly simple, but something feels off.

stc_catalyst.text: The first clue that suggests this is more than a simple murder.
